description: Variation of condition 2 (development built in accordance with approved plans) and condition 4 (construction of extensions or building works) to allow:Unit 1 - proposed first floor and roof level external wall extended outward to align wall at ground floor. Unit 1 - proposed mansard roof with rear facing dormer, two front facing rooflight with habitable space in the loft.of Full Planning Permission reference 21/4023 dated 9 February, 2022, for Demolition of existing garages and erection of three two storey dwellinghouses with two with rear dormer windows and two front rooflights, division of amenity space and associated vehicular crossovers, front car parking,refuse and cycle storage and soft landscaping.
site_name: Garages next to 76, Llanover Road, Wembley
